Question Regarding S Rank
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Question Regarding S Rank
By Salokin on Friday, March 28, 2008 - 10:52 am:

What happens when you finish all the S Rank battles? I saw that
there was a Official S Rank Battle and I wondered what happens to
your monster when he wins that battle. If you know please tell me.

By GM on Friday, March 28, 2008 - 01:23 pm:

Unlike the other games, beating the Official S simply gives you bragging rights. There is no Major 4, but there are special standard tourneys exclusive to the rank, like the full team battle (5 Vs. 5).

By Salokin on Saturday, March 29, 2008 - 12:26 pm:

Okay thx.
